attributes.action: Random and compulsory drug testing of all MPs, peers and officials within Parliament.
attributes.additional_details: The government should introduce as soon as possible the regular, random drug testing of British MPs, peers and officials within Parliament. These spot checks should become an everyday occurrence to help ensure respectable behaviour and responsible, clear-headed decision making by those elected to represent the interests of the British people. Those who fail these tests should face the full force of the law, and dismissal from their government position.
